beans.description:
This is an example of an web service IWriteConnector definition that may be used by an Openadaptor Java client to send data to an Openadaptor with a Web service IReadConnector such defined in example/spring/connectors/soap/ws-server.xml.
To programmatically invoke the Openadaptor Java client you need the following in your Java program:
import org.openadaptor.client.OAClient; .... OAClient client = new OAClient("ws-client.xml"); client.send("my data");
You need the following in your classpath:
lib lib/openadaptor.jar lib/openadaptor-spring.jar lib/openadaptor-depends.jar lib/opt/activation.jar
Before executing the client program run server adaptor: soap/ws-server.xml

bean.description: This is a write connector that sends data to Openadaptor with a Web service read connector.
